name: IcMagiosth
description:
IcMagiosth - This is a submission for Wowie Jam 3. All code, art and audio are made by me. Code and art made during the jam, while music was made before. Font: Helios, by sixdegrees

MOUSE ONLY CONTROLS = MOBILE-FRIENDLY

Overview:

You control a cute little cyan boi who will try to reach the finish line. However, there are spikes in the way. The cyan boi can sacrifice himself to destroy the spikes. Watch out, he only has 3 lives! Oh yeah! There's also a box you get to move around to get through the obstacles.

Controls:

MOUSE-ONLY: Click anywhere on the screen to move your character (in the x axis) OR click and drag a box around.

Goal:

Try to reach the flag by strategically using the box, and destroying the spikes. Find out what IcMagiosth means when you reach level 7.

Credits:

Font used: Helios, by sixdegrees, from https://www.dafont.com/

Programming, Art, Audio: Made by ME

program and art made during the jam, while audio was made previously.
